lead_paragraph: The company, which is working toward carrying tourists into space, separated a crew capsule from the booster of its New Shepard rocket.

headline.print_headline: Private Rocket Company Passes Critical Escape Test
headline.main: Blue Origin, Jeff Bezos’ Rocket Company, Passes an In-Flight Escape Test

snippet: The company, which is working toward carrying tourists into space, separated a crew capsule from the booster of its New Shepard rocket....
abstract: Blue Origin rocket company announces latest achievements of its spacecraft program, which aims to take paying customers into outer space by 2018; says it ran successful in-flight test of launch-abort system of New Shepard spaceship, insuring safety of passengers if flight goes awry.
